website_summaries.verdict: A large stainless steel pizza peel with a foldable wooden handle.
pros: Handle can be removed for quick and easy cleanup
Peel surface is large and smooth
cons: The peel is large but not wide
Users find it a bit narrow

customer_reviews.title: Works well, be prepared for timing.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good size for the oven and so far has worked quite well. FAR better price (almost half) of what the local cookware shop was selling the same model for. Just a warning, your oven will likely take longer to heat up to temperature, but it should maintain a more steady temp, since this had to heat up as well. We leave in in the oven at all times, without any issues, but all preheat times have increased. If electricity usage is of big concern, it's just something to keep in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Moran

customer_reviews.title: Pizza Friday is complete!
customer_reviews.text: We make pizza in our house every Friday and had previously been using a pizza wheel cutter. That worked fine but sometimes squished the cheese. This super sharp knife rocks in place with little effort cutting the pizza without scooting the cheese off the pizza. Comes with a storage sheath.
customer_reviews.author: savin' a dime

customer_reviews.title: Love it but stains easily, if that matters, which it doesn’t to me.
customer_reviews.text: It gets stained up really quickly and doesn’t clean very well because it’s such a light color, but I love the way it functions, and it was a great price! I wouldn’t hesitate to buy it again or buy it for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: pink1015

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and edge. Not meant to be cleaned in Dishwasher!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my pizza stone. Extremely sharp and cuts perfect. I Do Not recommend washing in Dishwasher!! Wood handled utensils should never be washed in a dishwasher. Heat/Humidity destroys the finish and swells/cracks the wood. Very easy to clean by hand if you are not lazy.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin N.

customer_reviews.title: Great for kitchen or camp
customer_reviews.text: Great Pizza Peel. PROs: Removable handle for easy cleanup Movable handle for compact stowage Durable Spatula has withstood repeated dishwasher washings (I know I know) Great size for kitchen, grill, or camping CONs: Larger handle would increase reach and leverage I own three if these: one for my kitchen, one for my grill, and one in my camper. Works great cooking pizzas on my home oven pizza stone. Also worksgreat for large staeks and roasts on the grill. What I really like is that it's compact enough to use in our camper's mini oven, yet large enough for campfire chores. I would recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Admiral Schmickover

customer_reviews.title: Outset QZ10 SS Pizza Peel w Rosewood Handle
customer_reviews.text: The day I received this pizza peel I was so pleased I proceeded to bake 5 loaves of bread. The bread slid off the peel with ease. After the bread had baked the loaves went back onto it without a problem. The bread had cornmeal on the bottom so it wasn't neccessary to add any to the peel or oven stone. Being able to remove the handle to toss it into the dishwasher is a definite plus and also helps with storage. This is my first pizza peel and I feel I picked a winner! Haven't used it for an actual pizza yet (lol) but if it performs like it did with the bread, it will be an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen848

customer_reviews.title: Girlfriend always wants pizza now
customer_reviews.text: This is the easiest way i can get my girlfriend to cook pizza with me. I get to cook, she can slice with confidence and we both eat well.
customer_reviews.author: Rodolfo Saldana

customer_reviews.title: Size advertised is not accurate.
customer_reviews.text: It is slightly larger that the advertised 13" and because of the it would not fit properly in my new Cuisinart Oven.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes good pizzas
customer_reviews.text: Was using regular pizza pans for a long time and could never get a good crust. The crust would be almost raw still and toppings would be starting to burn. Put this stone in the oven for 1-2 hours at 450 to get it up to temperature and slide your pizza onto it with a pizza peel and In about 8-10 mins and you have a perfect pizza
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pizza stone
customer_reviews.text: Not a great stone feels more like ceramic clay pot. Not a true “stone”. Would not purchase again. Sorry Outset
customer_reviews.author: Twollin

customer_reviews.title: Helps to make a crispy crust!
customer_reviews.text: We have wanted a pizza stone for a long time and finally got this one. I have been making pizza out of cauliflower and this works really well for it. I do recommend this stone.
customer_reviews.author: Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Shipped very fast! This item is very sharp, which makes cutting pizza very easy. There is a reason why it comes with a sleeve people! Used to cut other food items beside pizza!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Falcon

customer_reviews.title: Fits the small oven that we use often.
customer_reviews.text: Love to have a stone when I'm baking. Great for re-heating pizza!
customer_reviews.author: Judi S. Claveloux-roth

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow- not useful for me
customer_reviews.text: It's a well made tool but the size doesn't work for me. It's too narrow to hold a small pizza. The sides flop over and with super hot sauce that's dangerous. Couldn't tell until after I'd unpacked and used it, and didn't save packaging to return it. Can't imagine what else I'd use it for either. Chose it because I have no storage for the large peels- but this one would need to be about 3-4" wider to work for a pizza unless maybe you're just heating individual slices.
customer_reviews.author: I'd Rather Be Outdoors

customer_reviews.title: Item is 13". Not 16.5"
customer_reviews.text: In product dimensions section and in title said it was 16.5" long but only 13". I wanted it for xlarge pizzas and this is too small. Sellers need to be accurate with their descriptions and dimensions because it is vital when ordering online and can't see the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Davis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for RV oven
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use in our RV oven, and it works like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Author Robin Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected.
customer_reviews.text: For some reason this stone stinks, like burnt oil every time i use it. I thought it was because it was new but it continues to do it. I am considering getting rid of it, the smell is so strong. Also everything i put on it sticks. I have to scrub to get it clean.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Great stone for the oven
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this second stone for my kitchen oven for my pizza making needs.
customer_reviews.author: louie deutsch

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. This seems to be a good baking stone
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. This seems to be a good baking stone. I have had others and after 6 months they randomly crack. I do use them at very high heat when baking bread. I have had this for about 2+ months. It is very convenient to use. I usually store it in the oven when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Ruff

customer_reviews.title: I needed to replace our outdoor pizza oven's stone and ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace our outdoor pizza oven's stone and this did the trick. Just as described and shipped as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Susan K. Schilling

customer_reviews.title: Round Stone
customer_reviews.text: Wish I would have bought it a long time ago! Great quality, excellent for baking a myriad of dish's...looks good too!
customer_reviews.author: Moneen L Durkin

customer_reviews.title: Great pizza stone, heavy duty!!
customer_reviews.text: Great stone, thick, large for heavy duty use. Had to use corn meal on stone for 1st few times so dough did not stick but after seasoned, it is fine. What I do is to place fresh dough on stone and fix pizza, then place in over, then turn oven on so stone warms up. You cannot place cold stone in hot oven or it risks cracking. Great stone, buy it!!
customer_reviews.author: Pete Pietro

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this stone for our smoker
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this stone for our smoker. Be sure to cover with cornmeal and your pizza will not stick. After having a smoked pizza, I will never have one any other way.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Girl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price and perfect for our oven. I shopped around and I definitely recommend this item!!
customer_reviews.author: tavia

customer_reviews.title: Just as Described
customer_reviews.text: This product is just what I needed. Very durable. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Cherilynne Owen-Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very well-made and sturdy. Cuts pizza easily and quickly. Blade cover is a nice extra!
customer_reviews.author: t_zborowsky

customer_reviews.title: Good size,  well made,  but could be thicker.
customer_reviews.text: Fit in my Breville toaster/convection oven perfectly, but could be thicker for better heat transfer when baking pizza.
customer_reviews.author: HT Luver

customer_reviews.title: Crisps my crust!
customer_reviews.text: I make a large 18" pizza. It actually fits fine on this pizza stone. Very happy with results. Item was exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Lkjh234

customer_reviews.title: Pizza peel/Stainless steel
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice piece. It's sturdy and not too big, perfect size for me. And it's stainless steel which makes it more durable and attractive. Note, check the size: if you are looking for a bigger peel (as if you were going to handle an extra-large pizza), this may not be your pizza peel.
customer_reviews.author: F. Sassi

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: Received my order today and it was completely broken in half, both pieces stacked neatly on top of each other within the styrofoam frame.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Vogelzang

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It fits Breville 845BSS - I wished a rectangular one (9X13) would be available
customer_reviews.author: cameliaTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Using in Convection microwave oven
customer_reviews.text: It fits the smaller sized oven. We thought that the stone would be harder like our current larger stone from a different manufacturer. Is this a synthetic?
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Size Stated
customer_reviews.text: This is a 13.5” round stone. Not 13” like stated in the description. Unfortunately the extra 1/2” makes it not fit in our toaster oven.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pizza aid!
customer_reviews.text: The pizza peel works great, no more stuck dough or messy clean ups. I've used it on the outdoor grill, and in the oven. The handle is a fold away, it's easy to clean and works great. What more could you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: John Hatcher

customer_reviews.title: It works as posted.
customer_reviews.text: The stone has worked perfect since it stopped smelling. I had to place it in my bbq on high heat for several hours to get it seasoned. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: NANCY RAY

customer_reviews.title: Bread peel
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want a very wide peel because I use mine for bread. It works well and I like that the handle turns inward for storage. It's well made.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Fit on my small Komodo grill
customer_reviews.text: Fit my grill and also useful in oven. So far good purchase
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca L. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Recipient liked that handle folds for storing
customer_reviews.text: Given as Christmas gift. Recipient liked that handle folds for storing.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Grammy

customer_reviews.title: Its an okay paddle but you can only stretch a ...
customer_reviews.text: Its an okay paddle but you can only stretch a pie the diameter of the most narrow part of the paddle unless you want a square pizza.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan S

customer_reviews.title: Nice stone
customer_reviews.text: Love it, perfect size, great on the grill or oven
customer_reviews.author: Jordan McMillan

customer_reviews.title: Larger than 13"
customer_reviews.text: The stone is larger than the advertised 13" and therefore won't fit in my toaster oven.
customer_reviews.author: A. Braun

customer_reviews.title: Quality product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! Classy and beautiful! Helps keep the grill clean. Can also be used for other items, great for cooking fish!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mariana Kielty

customer_reviews.title: Pizza time
customer_reviews.text: the entire family loves this the pizza comes out much more tastier and much more crisp .quality product .
customer_reviews.author: Larry Porter

customer_reviews.title: Broke after first use
customer_reviews.text: This product was defective - broke after just one time in the oven.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Nakamura

customer_reviews.title: It's good to have the biggest one in the 'hood.
customer_reviews.text: It's good to have the biggest one in the 'hood. It works fine for large pieces if flaky fish on the grill
customer_reviews.author: Invent1

customer_reviews.title: Not great for any type of baking!
customer_reviews.text: Not easy to clean at all. Terrible smell when cooking with it.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery time and it was exactly as advertised and exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.author: Robert Dennison

customer_reviews.title: Outset QZ10 Stainless Steel Pizza Peel
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this item a couple times so far, but it seems to do the job very nicely. It's easy to handle and clean and is a fine quality. I'm looking forward to using it for many years.
customer_reviews.author: D. O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I use this on Big Green Egg BBQ with pizza stone and place setter. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander J. Keenan

customer_reviews.title: better than wood
customer_reviews.text: I used a wood "peel" for years before getting this. Works well, easy to clean and the foldaway handle is a great feature for ease of storage. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: cope's stuff

customer_reviews.title: Mini Marvel
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for toaster ovens and home ovens. Sturdy enough to lift and move pizzas without loosing your pie
customer_reviews.author: M. Allison

customer_reviews.title: gift
customer_reviews.text: purchased as a gift to go with pizzas on the grill book. I think it will serve the purpose well. seems to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: j***********

customer_reviews.title: Great Peel -- just be careful with repeated dish-washings...
customer_reviews.text: I'm ordering a new one now -- that so that speaks to my readiness to re-purchase; however, the bad news being that my old peel (about 3.5 years of use) finally gave way (where the wood handle tightens into the steel peel for compact storage). I'm guessing that I subjected the peel to too many dishwasher cycles, as the rosewood handle appears to have degenerated from repeat water exposure. So long as you're careful to avoid prolonged water exposure, (I'm hoping) this peel should hold up a bit longer -- I guess I'll find out.
customer_reviews.author: Herkma

customer_reviews.title: pizza peel
customer_reviews.text: We love this and use it for our grilled pizza we make on the BBQ. It is just the right size for personal pizzas and the length keeps your hands away from the heat. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs shopper

customer_reviews.title: Cracked on the third cook
customer_reviews.text: Worked well on my first two pizzas. I made them on my egg @600°F. On the third pizza, I put the pizza on @625°F and after a minute, I heard a ping and the stone split in half. If cracked one more time during the cook. Good news is the pizza was great. Bad news is my stone is now in three pieces.
customer_reviews.author: James Phillips

customer_reviews.title: just what he wanted
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my father. He uses it over a fire pit he has on his patio and loves it. Its very heavy duty, no cracks or any issues (besides the occasional burnt pizza)
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Super tool!
customer_reviews.text: Have used it dozens of times already! Thin enough to pick anything up and thick enough to be durable and extra strong.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Foldable Pizza Peel
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this choice. I love it. The weight is great and it should last me forever.
customer_reviews.author: R. Frederick

customer_reviews.title: I'm so glad I bought this item.
customer_reviews.text: Oh boy! This is a gem of a pizza peel, and the quality is outstading. So ddurable and easy to use. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert R. Ruhoy

customer_reviews.title: Really nice pizza peel, but
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pizza peel but wish I would have purchased a SS version much wider. Folding handle is very handy. The SS cleans easily.
customer_reviews.author: Glendesprung

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: it works very well, although the handle is a little loose.
customer_reviews.author: Mary guseman

customer_reviews.title: Great fir barbecue grill
customer_reviews.text: Love this stone for cooking pizza on our Traeger. It is a little too big for the oven though
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Thueringer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived yesterday and I put it to work this morning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: We actually use it to transport and stack small cakes, but it is very sturdy, easy to clean and store.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great for handling pizzas. easy to clean and lightweight. Good quality. machine washable. it was a good purchase. i reccomend this product
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Robles

customer_reviews.title: Good heat retention
customer_reviews.text: These work great to moderate the heat in an old electric oven, and they bake a pretty good pizza, too, only 4 stars because the first couple of heatings caused an odd smell.
customer_reviews.author: J. Muhm

customer_reviews.title: Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Love it.. Use in BBQ or in oven. Makes for a nice pizza.
customer_reviews.author: J. C. Jorgensen

customer_reviews.title: not good
customer_reviews.text: smells when heated up, very disappointed, to late to return, wasted my money. a friend of mine has a stone, i should have asked her what to get.
customer_reviews.author: granny

customer_reviews.title: The only way to reheat Pizza
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Holds heat well, no smell Cons: Dirties Quickly, hard to clean Overall I'm happy with my purchase, I'm just a little sad about how easily it gets burned stuff all over even though my food didn't burn. Also since you can't clean it while it's hot, it's really hard to get the gunk off when it's all cold. Reheat Pizza Instructions for crispy crust: 1. Set oven to 500 and make sure this pizza stone is in there. 2. Once preheated, set oven temp to 400 and place your pizza directly on the stone 3. Reheat for 10-15 minutes 4. take out of oven to cool or just burn your mouth on how good it tastes
customer_reviews.author: Ra

customer_reviews.title: 13" round is larger
customer_reviews.text: The 13" round is actually 13 3/8" in size and too big for a Breville BOV800XL Smart Oven. So check the sizes before you order
customer_reviews.author: Gary D. Houser

customer_reviews.title: Not as described!
customer_reviews.text: Was described as a 13 inch and is actually a 13.5 inch. This was a very important detail as it will not fit in my oven at 13.5 inches. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: MBuzz

customer_reviews.title: ... instructions but the product it turns out is as good as some of the best commercial Pizza's we have ...
customer_reviews.text: It takes a while to "break in" per instructions but the product it turns out is as good as some of the best commercial Pizza's we have ordered in the past. It is a heavy utensil and finding convenient storage took a bit of creativity. Since we have owned it we are enjoying lot's more pizza meals. Would definitely buy again, same brand. Yes, we have recommend it to friends.
customer_reviews.author: DSS

customer_reviews.title: Great size for smaller items
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pizza peel to use when making flatbreads on my pizza stone. It is the perfect size for the task. The quality of the item is very high including the rosewood handle. I like that the handle folds over (you just loosen the little rosewood knob a bit and turn the handle inward) and it locks in place for normal use. This peel is thin enough that you can easily insert it underneath items that are cooking. Being stainless steel it washes up nice. I would recommend it for making smaller items in the oven but not for a big pizza as it would be too narrow for that.
customer_reviews.author: George Carey

customer_reviews.title: Pizza class savior!
customer_reviews.text: I teach a lot of pizza making classes. It makes cutting the pizzas so much easier. Easy enough for kids to cut their own pizza. I will without hesitation purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: Grilled pizza
customer_reviews.text: Only used once so far but it worked great for grilling pizzas. Without it my crust always burnt!
customer_reviews.author: tst

customer_reviews.title: Bad Option For Pizza Crust
customer_reviews.text: This is not real stone. It does not heat up properly and does little good for your pizza crust.
customer_reviews.author: Cool Breeze

customer_reviews.title: Pizza Peel
customer_reviews.text: The Outset QZ10 Stainless Steel Pizza Peel w/Rosewood Handle is made very well and works great for cooking pizzas on the grill or removing hot cooked pies, cakes & cookies out of the oven. It is very easy to clean and with the collapsable handle easy to store away after use. I would recommend one for every household. Ordered it on line from Amazon and received it in less then a week. Great Service Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: cga

customer_reviews.title: Could Live Without
customer_reviews.text: Thought a pizza stone would be a good idea for both pizza and bread. Well, turned out it's not so much. Bread bakes okay on the stone but I find it impossible, even with a pizza peeler, to move the pizza to the hot stone. This is just another rarely used item taking up space in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Hurricane

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and very functional. This knife is very comfortable to use.
customer_reviews.author: Denise B

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product!
customer_reviews.text: This stone worked great on the grill! Cooked up an amazing pizza that my family enjoyed thoroughly!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Ray

customer_reviews.title: This pizza stone is great!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy that I ordered this pizza stone. I recently started to make pizza at home more often and the small stone I had could not fit much pizza, so I really needed a larger stone. This was the largest pizza stone I could find and I love it. The pizza cooked on it comes out great and it provides space for a pretty large pizza. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MandysMom

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: Item was shipped quickly and arrived thru USPS; which isn't the best mean of delivery. The pizza stone was of excellent quality and works great. I bought it to replace the pizza stone in my Blackstone pizza oven (which broke).
customer_reviews.author: David Jessop

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I have used the heck out of this and I love it. It takes abuse and hasn't cracked yet. I have a couple others that cracked for no apparent reason. Its the biggest one I could find so I can cook the huge Costco pizzas on it no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Cool!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so cool. It is constructed like a German gun maker built it. Turn the nut and it folds up no bigger than a cake pan. I hope to get away with this posting as this is a Christmas present, and a hint. I haven't put it trough its paces yet, but like I said the engineering is top rate.
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRICE, GREAT STONE! Fits well in Breville toaster oven ;D
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a very high temp rated stone so it would be less likely to crack. This is the highest rated stone I could find AND it was 1/3 of the price for the Breville brand pizza stone! It does not smell weird and cooks great. I am tickled at what a great find this was :D
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Stryker

customer_reviews.title: my pizza crust stuck like glue to the stone
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for grilling my pizza on the BBQ. Even though I followed the instructions, my pizza crust stuck like glue to the stone. I was happy with the customer service that sent me a replacement at no cost. I've been hesitant to use my new one on the grill and just use it in my oven. NO stick there. Im giving them 3 stars because of the great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: cjbowen

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for smaller ovens ....
customer_reviews.text: If you love your homemade pizza or even frozen pizza, this pizza grill stone is perfect for smaller ovens.
customer_reviews.author: LindacaroL Gorby

customer_reviews.title: Great for small to medium pizzas
customer_reviews.text: Great for small to medium pizzas, but I use it for a lot of oven stuff. Removable handle is nice so you can just chuck the spatula part in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Ten*K

customer_reviews.title: The folding handle is scary
customer_reviews.text: Peel is good sized, and handy for baked goods, but the folding handle is scary. It feels weak, and the handle is pretty short if you're using a commercial oven of any height. There is no way I would try to use it for pizza.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Greene

customer_reviews.title: Yummy crusts with your take and bake pizzas!
customer_reviews.text: The stone is described; timely delivery. We really like the way the crust turns out on Costco Take and Bake pizzas!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, does just what we were looking for in a product.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndal

customer_reviews.title: Having very good luck with this product.
customer_reviews.text: I am having very good luck with cooking on this. Just put in and let warm up with the oven, or grille, to prevent any possibility of it cracking. But it is a great product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Duane A. McCarty

customer_reviews.title: Extremely nice
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to use with our outdoor grill. It's hefty, won't get charred from the flames and has a removable rosewood handle that folds down for storage. While its a pizza peel, think of it as a large stainless kitchen spatula. It has multiple uses around the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: cybersherrif

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The perfect Pizza stone. Great quality Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Terry

customer_reviews.title: The Best Cooking Tool I Ever Purchased
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tool I ever purchased for my pizza and grill cooking. Love the way it cleans up, big and roomy for everything I cook in my pizza oven and on my grill.
customer_reviews.author: Buzz Rinkinen

customer_reviews.title: Broken when recieved.
customer_reviews.text: Broken when I received it. Don't think its a MFG issue, Their box had foam on sides of grill, wouldn't hurt if their were not support in middle of grill. Amazon box had one piece of paper in it, not nearly enough to keep 3 items for slopping around in a box which was way too big. No wonder it was broken.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn S.

customer_reviews.title: Great pizza peal
customer_reviews.text: This is a great peal. It's easy to clean an because of the fold-down handle, it's easy to store. It's fine for small pizzas, but need extra support if you're trying to pickup a large pizza with a lot of toppings. Small is all I cook though, so it works just fine for me. BTW, parchment paper works much better than corn meal when transferring the pizza to the oven.
customer_reviews.author: WS

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: It seems like a good product. I'm using it to cook pizza on my grill and it will take some practice.
customer_reviews.author: J M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made pizza peel. I needed this type of product to remove meats from the smoker. It is perfect for that. But, i will also use if for removing pizza from the outdoor grill. It more than met my expectatons.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: This pizza stone can get really hot without cracking!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my portable grill. Add the fact that it is truly high temp and I am loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Dre'

product_meta.title: Outset Stainless Steel Pizza Peel with Collapsible Rosewood Handle, 20-Inch Overall, 12-Inch x 7.75-Inch Spatula Area
product_meta.description: Style Name:21-Inch Pizza PeelPizza night is a family favorite. And part of the fun is preparing and baking the pizza! With the Outset Pizza Peel you'll no longer have to fret with moving the pizza from prep to pan and from pan to plate. Peel prevents spills and burns – keeping pizza night ever-so fun. With its fine rosewood handle that folds in for storage, and smooth stainless-steel surface, the pizza peel offers a safe & convenient way to remove pizza from your oven or grill. Also makes and excelllent bread peel for homemade or bakery breads. Whether you're inside or out, transferring and cutting pizza has never been so easy!
feature_bullets: CONSTRUCTED OF FOOD GRADE STAINLESS STEEL: Glistening pizza peel with rosewood handle features a smooth oversized spatula surface for all your baking and convection needs
HANDSOME ROSEWOOD HANDLE: Protects fingers from heat and folds down for easy storage- Perfect size for restaurant, home, apartment, RV, or camper
ERGONOMIC DESIGN: Beautiful handle is designed to fit in your hand comfortably; Pizza paddle is perfectly balanced to support pizza and baked goods from oven or grill to table!
ENTERTAIN IN STYLE: Restaurant-style pizza and bread peel will delight friends and family by offering a unique serving tool to serve and transfer pizza, artisan breads, pastries, fish and more
CARE & MEASUREMENTS: Hand wash in warm, soapy water, towel dry; Measures: 2O inch length overall; Stainless Steel Peel: 12" L x 7. 75" W; Handle 8" L X 2" W
